p: From the ethyl acetate extract of L. radula spathulenol, angustanoic acid E and 5-hydroxy-4′,7-dimethoxy flavone were purified; L. paniculata afforded ledol, guaiol and (−)-carnosol. All the compounds isolated from the ethyl acetate extracts were described here for the first time in the respective species. Guaiol and ledol, identified in the extract of L. paniculata, are also present, respectively, in L. radula and L. heteromorpha EO.
